PHPCore Class Example

Class synopsis

class MyClass {

   const INITIALIZED;

   /* Static Properties */
   protected static $Handlers = [];
   protected static $Instances = [];

   /* Static Methods */
   public static function __destroyInstances(): void
   public static function &__getInstance([?string $name = null]): object
   public static function __initialize(): void

   /* Properties */
   protected $Config = [];

   /* Methods */
   public function __construct()
   public function close(): bool
}
